content: kitty ankle socks by ginerbean rav id / @inorgaknit on instagram these are two-toned toe-up ankle socks with a kitty chart can make two-of-a-kind for ultra matchiness or use contrasting yarns to make complementary kitties 1 materials needles double pointed needles size 1 2 25 mm yarn mc and cc in fingering weight yarn for cat and background these should be contrasting enough that eyes and whiskers are visible on the kitty s face i used frabjous fibers cheshire cat in too much pepper and goat s beard <1 yard of pink/red fingering weight yarn for kitty nose notions scissors darning needle stitch marker gauge can be adjusted by changing either yarn weight or needle size 32 stitches should be 10% smaller than the width of the foot directions toe kitty with mc and two dpns use judy s magic cast-on to co 12 st on each of two dpns round 1 knit round 2 *k1 m1 k to last st on needle m1 k1 repeat from * to end of round 4 st increased round 3 *k1 m1 k to last st on needle m1 k1 repeat from * to end of round 4 st increased repeat these three rounds until you have 32 st on each dpn 64 st total redistribute stitches onto dpns or other needle of choice to continue in the round begin chart in the round see page 4 use only first 32 stitches half of the stitches for chart for the other half of the stitches other 32 st knit in mc these non- charted stitches will become the side of the sock where the heel will go note regarding chart execution you can knit the chart however you d like via duplicate stitching or intarsia in the round foot once the chart is finished continue knitting in the round in the cc until the sock measures 1 5 less than the length of the foot so if the foot is 8 knit until sock measures 6 5 in length knit across the charted 32 stiches and place them on hold until the heel is completed heel the non-charted 32 stitches will become the heel and are knit flat and in short row as follows knit 29 st wrap and turn purl until 3 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 4 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 4 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 5 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 5 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 6 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 6 st left on needle wrap and turn 2 knit until 7 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 7 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 8 st left on
